content:
While it may be frustrating to deal with pushback or back-talk from vendors or clients, it's important to remember that everyone has their own expertise and professionalism in their respective industries. They may bring viewpoints, experiences or updates that could enhance the event, ideas that you may miss if you don't collaborate and communicate effectively.

As an event planner, it's important to consider the feedback or concerns brought up by vendors or clients to create a successful event. Creating an event takes a team of people; hence, everyone involved must collaborate to make the event a success.

Remember that mutual respect, collaboration and communication are essential in achieving the best outcome for the entire team. It's important to be calm, professional and respectful while dealing with vendors and clients, and work towards finding practical solutions that work for everyone involved.
